casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy Benjamin BARTLETT. No. 19PA14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bartlett, Randy Benjamin. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. A. Leon Stanback, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of February 2015 by Defendant to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
